titleStmt.title: A caueat to preuent future iudgements: or, An admonition to all England more specially, to London and other places where the death of plague hath lately beene. By Robert Horn Minister of the Word.
titleStmt.author: Horne, Robert, 1565-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for Philemon Stephens and Christopher Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop at the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An admonition to all England.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
